Class ReferencePrice

java.lang.Object
hsbc.interview.enums.ReferencePrice
All Implemented Interfaces:
Config
public class ReferencePrice extends Object implements Config
Assumption: A reference Price should be passed in Variation Validator at runtime for calculation.
